description: n^a(n) is smallest power of n (with a(n) > 1) which starts with n.
comments: A070327(n) = n^a(n) for n > 1. [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 29 2011]
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..275
prog: (Haskell)import Data.List (isPrefixOf)a051248 n = 2 + length   (takeWhile (not . (show n `isPrefixOf`) . show) $ iterate (* n) (n^2))-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 29 2011
author: Michel ten Voorde (seqfan(AT)tenvoorde.org)
